help.message: First, @icon-tap tap anywhere to add a new planet.
That's your first planet! Now try to @icon-drag *drag* the planet to change its position.
Awesome! Now  @icon-drag *drag* the tip of the arrow to change the speed and direction of the planet.

Now *tap on the @icon-star star* to let the planet orbit;
tap on the @icon-star star again to pause.


(You can also tap on the @icon-menu menu
button to see more options.)
@h1 @icon-win Mission accomplished! @/h1 @separator Whoohoo! Look at that planet go! When you're ready, proceed to the next mission. @proceed-win
@h1 @icon-rocket Circular orbit @/h1 @separator Now, let's try to place a planet in a circular orbit. First, add a new planet.
The eccentricity of the planet is @eccentricity.
